title: So what are peoples thoughts on the new money-grab mode?
body:
Are you guys excited to give Riot your money for cute pets to follow you around in ARAM?
Are you actually exited about a mode where you don't actually fight people head on?
Do you guys love chess?

Or would you guys prefer something like URF, ARURF, or NB, permanently?


{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
